text: A version of this action that uses less javacript and may be usable for those who don't use javascript is available at https://actionnetwork.org/petitions/urgent-new-law-would-charge-protesters-with-terrorism?nowrapper=true&referrer=&source=
title: URGENT: proposed law would charge protesters with terrorism

meta_data.description: A proposed new law would allow authorities to charge protesters with "economic terrorism."
